A data transfer object representing organization filter options for audit functionality, containing essential organization identification and display information.

## Key Components

- **OrganizationFilterResponse** - Main DTO class with Lombok annotations for automatic getter/setter/builder generation
- **id** - String field for organization identifier used in filtering operations
- **name** - String field for organization display name in user interfaces
- **Swagger annotations** - OpenAPI documentation schema definitions for API documentation

## Usage Example

```java
// Creating an organization filter response
OrganizationFilterResponse filterOption = OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
    .id("org-123")
    .name("Acme Corporation")
    .build();

// Using in API response
List<OrganizationFilterResponse> organizationFilters = Arrays.asList(
    OrganizationFilterResponse.builder()
        .id("org-456")
        .name("Tech Solutions Inc")
        .build(),
    filterOption
);

// Accessing fields
String orgId = filterOption.getId();
String displayName = filterOption.getName();
```

This DTO is typically used in REST API responses to provide organization filtering options for audit screens or dropdown components.
